page.title: 04 HELE VILLAGE
page.content: My name is Sally.I am the only person in the class who lives at Hele.My mum has lived there all her life.The village is separated by a main road.I live in one long street with the beach at the end,where I take the dog for a walk.My brother borrows a boat to go out and put down lobster pots and go crabbing and fishing.On our side of the road we have a garage,a postoffice and general stores,a newsagents,a launderette,a cafe,two restaurants,a pub,holiday chalets and a car park. Across the main road is the old gas works which is used for a coal depot and for small industrial work shops. There is another holiday camp and the traffic is such a nuisance in the summer that my mum and dad will not let me ride my bicycle.The rest of the year it is quiet and peaceful.
